transcript: He had not ridden many hundred yards after that before he saw to his left, across the whole width of the field, an enormous mass of caval- ry in brilliant white uniforms, mounted on black horses, trotting straight toward him and across his path. Rostov put his horse to full gallop to get out of the way of these men, and he would have got clear had they continued at the same speed, but they kept increasing their pace, so that some of the horses were already galloping.
